snippet: The amount pledged by donor countries over three years to a global fund was more than the amount raised in 2010, but far short of the goal.
abstract: World's donor countries pledge $12 billion over three years to the Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria.
lead_paragraph: The amount pledged by donor countries over three years to a global fund was more than the amount raised in 2010, but far short of the goal.

headline.main: $12 Billion Is Pledged to Fight AIDS, TB and Malaria
